Class Money

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Money

extends java.lang.Object

      • toCurrency

        public Money toCurrency(java.lang.String currencyCode)
        Converts this Money object to the specified currency
        Parameters:
        currencyCode - New currency's code
        Returns:
